pageTitle: Deputy Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, March 4, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

2:00 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet Committee on the federal response to the coronavirus disease (COVID‑19).

Closed to media.

4:00 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will participate in a news conference to provide an update on coronavirus disease (COVID‑19). The Honourable Patty Hajdu, Minister of Health, the Chief Public Health Officer, Dr. Theresa Tam, and the Deputy Chief Public Health Officer, Dr. Howard Njoo, will be in attendance.

National Press Theatre
150 Wellington Street

Notes for media:

  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:45 p.m.
  • The media availability will also be held by teleconference. Toll-free (Canada/US) dial-in number: 1-866-206-0153 Passcode: 3328171#
